1206.name: 312 Tig
1206.Applications: Buffer layers before hardfacing, armor plate, exhaust systems, high, Manganese austenitic steel, heterogeneous welding, difficult to weld and unknown steels.
1206.Suitable_For: Buffer layers, armor plate, 409, 304, difficult to weld steels such as:, 25CrMo4, 42CrMo4, 50CrMo4, 42MnV7, 1.7218, 1.7225, 1.7228, 1.7223, AISI: 4130, 4140, 4150, C45, C60, tool steel repairs etc..
